ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kill-stealing bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s a bug.  It has to do with a misappropriation of damage or something when a pet is involved with a group.  I ve seen it happen many times, for example
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Mar 2000, Essam Khairullah wrote:

> I was with a level 36 Barbarian Shaman (with her pet) who was soloing, and I
> was grouped with a level 30 Druid.
>
> [Stuff about getting kill from shaman w/ pet w/ Fufil's]

It's a bug. It has to do with a misappropriation of damage or something
when a pet is involved with a group. I've seen it happen many times, for
example a group is holding the stone spider room in solusek B when a
ranger shows up to await a fire giant run. The group has a necro in it
with a pet, and on multiple occasions the single ranger gets the
experience instead of the group of six.

I don't claim to know how credit toward the kill works, but I've seen this
occur enough times to surmise the cause.

Athren
